name: BERA TECH
description: I am BERA TECH WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance the experience.

SESSION_ID.description: Ensure your session Id starts with the word TREX-MD$

MODE.description: Write true or false to make your bot mode public or self

ANTI_DELETE.description: Make it true to enable anti-delete

AUTO_BIO.description: Make it true to enable automatic bio updates

BIO_TEXT.description: Set the bio text format (use {time} for dynamic time updates)

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true if you want the bot to view statuses

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want the bot to send a message after viewing a status

AUTO_READ.description: Make it true if you want the bot to read messages automatically

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want the bot to show typing status

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want the bot to show recording audio status

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want the bot to always appear online

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto-block 212 numbers

REJECT_CALL.description: Make it true if you want the bot to reject calls
